snippet.title: Tower Song | Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
#rpg  #indiegamedevs #TowerSong #releasedate #outnow 

Tower Song available on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2336330/Tower_Song/ 

After years of silence, the dreaded Towers once again play their haunting Songs. Overcome challenging, crafted encounters with the Tower runner of your choice in this compelling, strategy role-playing game. Stop the Song and save the land - if you can.
